programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies To Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Give Peas A Chance - Wilbur passes a law to increase the healthy eating in Beanotown, replacing all foods with peas…of the mushy variety! The gang must avoid the people of Beanotown who are rapidly transforming into Zompeas, from the over consumption of the addictive green goo. Dennis uses the only un-mushed peas in town to sabotage Wilbur’s mush making factory and save the day!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Fan - Walter attempts to sabotage The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock, becoming Wanda and pretending to LOVE Dennis in order to break up the band!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep58
programme.desc: The Journey Within - The depleted team flies through space and enters a region of pure darkness, with no sign of life and seemingly no way out

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep6
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle want an interesting story to tell at their upcoming reunion, they accidentally take off for space in a very real rocket

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep17
programme.desc: Racetrack - Ton-Ton's friends, The 'Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Ocb - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast Of The Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep42
programme.desc: Humanning / Know It All - When Tip wants her nose pierced, Oh and the Boov become obsessed with modifying their bodies/Tip doesn't want to go to school anymore and discovers a shortcut to infinite knowledge

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as “teacher’s pet” on the class field trip.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Little Lost Toy - Smartysaurus is delighted because a little clockwork duck has appeared at the DinoLab. No one knows where she belongs but Noddy is sure that her family must be missing her so he decides to investigate and find her home. Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. And Smartysaurus is happy too because she can visit her new little friend whenever she wants! Quack, quack Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of Jumpy Revs - Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa'S Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank’D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep17
programme.desc: Racetrack - Ton-Ton's friends, The 'Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Dread Pirate Richie / Crush 4U Where Ru? - A tech-obsessed Richie struggles to stick to the pirate code. Richie surprises the girls with a robotic boy band -- modeled after Crush 4U!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as “teacher’s pet” on the class field trip.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast Of The Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep21
programme.desc: Savior - When all the other students at the Academy find out Cleo is the prophesied "Savior of the Galaxy," she worries they'll treat her differently. Then she worries they won't. Then there's this freaky bug lady.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Rupert And The Unusual Birthday - It's Edward's birthday and Rupert wants to give him the best birthday party ever. Ping Pong tries to speed things up by using her magic but it turns everything topsy-turvy. How can Rupert give Edward his party now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble'S Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - It’s a hot day and the pups head for the water park – but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals don’t show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save a Roo - It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.desc: Den Build Disaster - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble - Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington And The Bone - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere.

programme.desc: Big Rig Blaze - When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.desc: Space Alien Adventure! - Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Tomás's Birthday Surprise / Family Treasure Hunt - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Tomás a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Swimming With The Sharks - Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Winter Lights - Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington Joins A Band - The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep517
programme.desc: The Blaze Family - Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Video Game Heroes - Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Super Ballet Bowl! - Jump! Leap! Relevé! Bubbletucky sports fans love ballet! Molly and the rest of the Guppies want to learn how to tell a story through dance. It'll take practice, but they'll give ballet a new spin in the Super Ballet Bowl!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Wizard of Oz-tralia! - After Molly and Gil meet Bobby, a nature show host from Australia, they can't wait to learn all about Australian animals. From marsupials to the amazing platypus, the Guppies can't get enough of the creatures Down Under!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Need for Blazing Speed - When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Winter Lights - Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Fruit Camp! - The Guppies love fruits and vegetables, but Deema doesn't want to try broccoli! When the Guppies face their scout troop initiation, Deema will have to turn over a new leaf if she wants to earn her broccoli badge.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but get’s himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryder’s Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep102
programme.desc: Washing - Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Sheep - Dee encourages a friend to say 'sheep' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different sheep - a white sheep, a baa-ing sheep, a leaping sheep and a noodle sheep.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: Get On Track - Mayor Sho-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest... without taking away any trees!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: It's time to make up a story - When JoJo can't find her favourite Captain Chloe storybook, Gran Gran suggests they make up their own story.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Best Bike in the World - When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Rainy Day - Monty wonders whether there is a way to have fun outside, even when it's raining.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear - When some new grizzly bears arrive at the park during a hot summer, it's up to Andy to make sure they have everything they need to help them get rid of their winter coats.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S2) Ep17

programme.desc: The Swashbuckle Seven Seas - In this episode Seaweed starts to daydream about the Swashbuckle Seven Seas.

programme.title: Doctor'S Insight
programme.desc: Drug treatment for colorectal cancer has advanced from 2 types to 22 types in 25 years. Discover how molecular-targeted drugs help patients live longer and drastically reduce serious side effects.!

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
